name: nii-voskhod
description:
index.html

css:
ccs/style.scss - contains styles
ccs/_var.scss - contains variables
ccs/_ui.scss - contains elements
ccs/_mixin.scss - contains mixins
ccs/_media.scss - contains breakpoints

js:
js/jquery.mask.js - jquery mask plugin
js/jquery.validate.js - jquery validate plugin
js/select.js - form select handler
js/validate.js - form validate/submit handler

php:
php/mailer.php - php form handler ### sass watch ``` sass --watch style.scss:style.css ``` ### sass build ``` sass style.scss style.css ```
